attributes.review: I opened the app and the first thing I saw was a fat Cheeto in the shape of a horribly ugly man 🤢. Ever since I saw it I’ve been having nightmares of ugly Cheeto people and honestly it’s been very traumatizing 🤧. I recently have started therapy to cope with this horrible experience. Y’all pray for me.

attributes.title: Ooh chile what is dis hunny 👁👄👁
attributes.review: I opened the app and they got a white fridge... a white fridge???? Who has a white fridge. Anyways, the app called me homophobic slurs and decapitated my wig. That wig was $1,200. Who’s gonna pay for that? Not the Cheeto. If I could give this app 0 stars I would. Nobody wants to see the Cheeto naked getting a spray tan.

attributes.title: This app ain’t it
attributes.review: Very bad I opened it and gremlin appeared in my window trying to force to sign up for it😭 very traumatic I do not recommend to anyone please save your time you do not want to be seeing a Cheeto every time you open the app

attributes.title: Worst app EVER 😡😒🥱🤢
attributes.review:
I opened the app and was greeted with disturbing images of a Cheeto.😳 I almost threw up. 🤢 Then the app started glitching and my phone went crazy. What type of app does this? It’s outrageous and I’m furious. Would never recommend to ANYONE.🤬
This made my day🥰✨💗WORSE🦋🧚✨

attributes.title: Absolutely horrid
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with politics involving Trump. To my surprise I opened the app and right away it says “I’ll grab u by the -“ I shouldn’t continue. I felt very uncomfortable and the picture that showed up with this was a hot Cheeto.

attributes.title: WORST APP
attributes.review: This is possibly the worst app ever made and put on this earth!!! It makes me want to vomits my guts out until I eventually collapse and die from dehydration!!🤮🤮🤮 I actually would do that then EVER use this app again 💁‍♀️. Either way this app is a scam.... soooo NEVER GET IT!!

attributes.title: Don’t Download unless you’re going to rate it a 1 star
attributes.review: This man is trying to remove tiktok the most important app that teens and up are trying to communicate on and laugh and more this app is a racist President app so don’t download unless rate it and help us teens and up #BLM #TIKTOKLIVESMATTER

attributes.title: horrible app 🍊✨
attributes.review: took foreverrrr to download and after a whole day of installing as soon as i opened the app it blasted fOrEigNer all night long with no way to stop it so my mom kicked me out of my house. do not recommend 💔

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: So hateful, honestly one of the worst apps out here. Gives nightmares-10/10 wouldn’t recommend if it saved my life...😗💀 shouldn’t even be a thing. Hate it hate it hate it. Words can’t explain my disgust.

attributes.title: hahaha
attributes.review: Trump is the absolute worst president to ever run. And to think that he can ban tiktok without gen z going down without a fight is completely idiotic. he is an orange, homophobic, racist, sexist, man who should be thrown out of the office. i do not support him. at all. and neither should you. period.
